Dating: NEOLITHIC PERIOD (not before); NEOLITHIC PERIOD ?; PREDYNASTIC PERIOD (not after)
Name: Arrowhead with tang and barbs
Description: This beautiful tanged arrowhead has two wings or barbs on each side. Virtually identical examples have been found at Neolithic sites in the Faiyum. The artefact illustrated here probably also comes from the Faiyum Neolithic (5th millennium BC).
